A Moral Voyage: Proposal, Part 2 – The Syllabus

22 Nov 2015 tagged in a moral voyage, commonwealth honors college

From Honors Student Blog:

Last week, I talked about the proposal serving two purposes: the second of those two purposes being a syllabus for you, your committee, and the Honors College. I call it the syllabus section because it’s a lot easier to understand why CHC is asking some of these questions, and also how to structure the proposal, when you think about it in that context. There are basically four parts: Method, Evaluation, Communication, and Timeline.

Read the rest here.
